thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 2 of 658
thread.title: Norman Morgan
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Norman Morgan

author: Norman Morgan
title: Norman Morgan
text: had trouble getting sales person to finalize choice. could not get frame color I wanted. waited two weeks for color I wanted. still not available. I was told it would be another three weeks. salesperson talked me in getting another color. other than that I am very happy over all.
